title: my league wont open
body: I opened my lol and it wont work. so I clicked the icon and it said" the game was designed to run on windows or it contains a virus. PLZ SOMEBODY HELP ME!!!!!!

replies.body: That's weird, do you happen to have any antivirus running that's recently been updated?  Try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help make sure League is being added as an exception.  Let me know if it helps.
